overview: The melody of love played so sweetly, running through her veins like 1000 year old wine. Her tongue tasted the sweetness of the night as the exuberance of her sheer nylon’s lit up the room and engorged his heart with desire. Sheer Nylon The first of Kendo’s films to mix two different filming styles, the first film to incorporate his take on true Nude Art’
tagline: The film consists of five short scenes! of sheer nylon
title: Sheer nylons
